section.heading: Definitions.

para.text: For the purposes of this title, the term:

"Marijuana" shall have the same meaning as provided in section 102(3)(A) of the District of Columbia Uniform Controlled Substances Act of 1981, effective August 5, 1981 (D.C. Law 4-29; D.C. Official Code § 48-901.02(3)(A)).
"Undue hardship" shall have the same meaning as provided in section 101(10) of the Americans with Disabilities Act of 1990, approved July 26, 1990 (104 Stat. 330; 42 U.S.C. § 12111(10)).

section.annotation: as added Apr. 27, 2021, D.C. Law 23-276, § 2(e), 68 DCR 48
